abstract: Apple has avoided jaw-dropping takeovers in favor of a series of smaller deals, using the companies to buttress or fill a gap in products that already exist or are in development.
snippet: Apple has avoided jaw-dropping takeovers in favor of a series of smaller deals, using the companies to buttress or fill a gap in products that already exist or are in development.
lead_paragraph: One company used sensors to read body movements. Another recommended TV programs. Several others offered location and mapping services.

headline.main: For Hints at Apple’s Plans, Read Its Shopping List
headline.print_headline: For Hints at Apple’s Plans, Read Its Shopping List
